meanings.definition: a brand of dairy-free, vegan ice cream
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a scoop of tofuttis after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pint of tofuttis at the store.
meanings.sent3: The tofuttis melted quickly in the sun, making a sweet mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as cold and satisfying as a bowl of tofuttis on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The tofuttis was so creamy and delicious, it felt like a frozen cloud in my mouth.

meanings.definition: a type of non-dairy cheese alternative
meanings.sent1: The tofuttis slices melted perfectly on the burger.
meanings.sent2: I spread tofuttis on my crackers for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The mouse nibbled on the tofuttis, thinking it was real cheese.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the unexpected tang of tofuttis on a plain cracker.
meanings.sent5: The tofuttis had a smooth texture that reminded me of melted butter.

meanings.definition: a plant-based substitute for traditional dairy products
meanings.sent1: I used tofuttis instead of butter in the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The tofuttis yogurt was a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent3: The tofuttis fooled everyone at the party into thinking it was real cheese.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the comforting taste of tofuttis in a world of dairy.
meanings.sent5: The tofuttis spread easily on the toast, adding a creamy touch to breakfast.
